about_the_game:
Ultimate Upgrade Pack includes:
• SAO Game Series Battle BGM Collection
Change the battle music in SWORD ART ONLINE Last Recollection to battle music from past SWORD ART ONLINE series games!

• Digital Artbook
Digital artbook for SWORD ART ONLINE Last Recollection!

• Digital Soundtrack
Listen to your favorite tracks from SWORD ART ONLINE Last Recollection!

*Content included in this product may be available for purchase separately or in other editions. Please be aware of duplicate purchases.
